content: leah michelle designs leahmdesigns@gmail com box y dishclo th a waffle stitch pattern is used for this dishcloth it has great scrubbing ability with its garter stitch ridges each side has a unique pattern so it looks good from any angle by slipping the first stitch of every row and purling the last stitch the 2 side edges maintain an attractive appearance and the dishcloth lays flat and square without the need for a border stitch guide waffle stitch pattern row 1 rs sl1 kwise *k2 p1 repeat from * to end row 2 ws sl1 kwise *p2 k1 repeat from * to last 3 sts p3 row 3 sl1 kwise *k2 p1 repeat from * to end yarn row 4 sl1 kwise knit to last st p1 bernat handicrafter cotton 100% cotton 80 yd 73 m /50 grams 1 skein shown in #085 jute and #089 banana yellow repeat row 1-­ 4 for patt needles one pair size 7 4 5 mm needles or size needed knitting instructions to obtain gauge cast on 46 sts gauge 10 sts and 13 row = 2 inches in waffle stitch work row 1 -­ 4 of waffle stitch pattern see stitch guide pattern 15 times then work row 1 -­ 3 once more measurements bind off all sts kwise weave in ends approximately 9 inches wide and 10 inches long before washing the dishcloth will shrink in the wash especially in the length washing instructions copyright 2012 2008 by leah michelle designs this pattern photos and machine wash and dry products made from this pattern are intended for private use only and may not be distributed for commercial purposes without the written consent of the designer
